long_description: The ProRack Ski and Snowboard carrier is an affordable choice for transporting up to 6 pairs of skis or 4 snowboards to your favorite resort. Universal attachment hardware fits round bars, square bars, aero bars and most factory roof racks. Soft rubber pads gently cradle skis and boards. 1-button access makes it simple to operate, even when you're wearing gloves. Includes locks and keys.
short_description: The ProRack Ski and Snowboard carrier is an affordable choice for transporting up to 6 pairs of skis or 4 snowboards to your favorite resort.
